author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: عراق اخبار داده شد بطیور ظلمتیّه و البتّه از بعض اراضی نعیب مرتفع خواهد شد چنانچه در سنین قبل شده در کلّ احوال پناه بحقّ برده که مباد متابعت نفوس کاذبه نمائید
translation: On the eve of Our departure from ‘Iráq, We have warned the faithful to anticipate the appearance of the Birds of Darkness. There can be no doubt whatever that the croaking of the Raven shall be raised in certain lands, as it hath been heard in recent years. Whatever may betide, seek refuge in the one true God, that He may shield you from the wiles of the impostor.
